content: Morning Rohan! Welcome back 😊 Hope Jakarta went smoothly. Did you manage to try the high-protein breakfast each day?
Morning Ruby. Yep, had it 3 out of 3 mornings. Felt fuller till lunch 👍
Perfect. That's exactly what we were aiming for. Carla will fold it into your regular rotation.
Hi Rohan. Uploading your Phase 1: Foundation training plan to the app now. Focus is on goblet squats, RDLs, rows. Short demo videos included.
Got it. I'll review on the commute.
To lock in form, I'd like one in-person session this week. Ruby can coordinate with Sarah for a 60-min slot at your home gym.
Makes sense. Let's get it scheduled.
On it. Will check with Sarah and send you options today.
Rohan, introducing Zone 2 cardio this phase. For you: aim for 125-135 bpm for 30 mins. It builds mitochondrial efficiency & supports ApoB lowering.
Clear. I'll use the Garmin alerts to stay in range.
Rachel, looks like I'm missing adjustable kettlebells for the plan.
Noted. I'll shortlist a couple of high-quality options and share links in a bit.
Here are two adjustable kettlebells with solid reviews: [link1] [link2]. Shall I order the first one? Ships in 2 days.
Go ahead with the first one, thanks.
Done. Will arrive Thursday - Sarah will receive it.
Quick thought - the new plan feels like more time than my current setup.
Understood. You can go for 'minimum effective dose': 3x45-min strength + 2x30-min cardio = ~4.5 hrs/week. Fits your 5-hour cap.
That works. Just didn't want it creeping into weekends.
Noted - all sessions can be Mon-Fri. Weekends free unless you want extra Zone 2.
Sarah confirmed, in-person with Rachel booked for Tue 26th, 7 AM, home gym.
Perfect slot, thanks!
How have mobility drills been going since last week?
4/7 days - mornings are better for it. Travel week threw me off.
Solid start. Aim for 5/7 this week - even 5 mins helps loosen hips & spine.
New plan looks good overall. I'll start tomorrow.
Noted. I'll log start date so we can track Phase 1 metrics.
FYI, last Fri's Jakarta dinner: HRV dropped 12 ms next day, deep sleep down 25 min. Pattern shows >1 drink impacts recovery.
Got it. One-drink limit on work trips from now.
Also, I still prefer whole-food protein over powders post-workout.
Chicken skewers and greek yogurt with berries still remain the best for post-workout plans/
Nice. Will stock on the yogurt & chicken skewers.
Kettlebells arrived. Sarah placed them in the home gym.
Quick check-in, how was the high-protein breakfast back in SG this week?
Still works well. No mid-morning crash.
Good, Javier's got it on your Mon/Wed/Fri schedule now.
Let me know if any lifts feel awkward this week. We can tweak in real time.
Will do. Starting with goblet squats today.
End of week snapshot: Phase 1 started, equipment sorted, travel nutrition integrated. How’s energy?
Energy's steady - liking the structure so far.
Great start. We'll review first metrics in 2 weeks 📊
